name: No Phone Call
description:
A chat/StepMania hybrid that has you trying to brush off a friend and avoid a phone call. All the correct responses are given to you and timed specifically. Can you have the perfect conversation?

  • Chat with Oscar in real time.
  • Avoid his pointed questions.
  • Time your responses perfectly.
  • Find and complete the secret conversation.*

Works best in Firefox and Chrome; there are some issues with Safari.

*There's a hint in the screenshots.
